.. dropdown:: **dmd**
    
    Returns the dry mass density (DMD) image.

    .. raw:: html
      
        <p class="title">Synthax</p>
    

    .. code-block:: matlab

        val = obj.dmd();

    .. raw:: html
      
        <p class="title">Description</p>

    ``val`` is the DMD image, pg/um^2. This function actually just consists of multiplying the ``OPD`` in [nm] by 5.56e-3.
